title: Evidence for Disease Annotation
description: Evidence for Disease Annotation consists of a publication or reference and an evidence code from the evidence code ontology.

evidenceCode.description: an evidence code from the ECO.

publication.description: in this instance, a publication is made up of a MOD identifier and a PubMed ID.  TODO pull this out into a stand a lone object to be used by other modules.

publicationModId.description: the MOD identifier for the pub. required as many MODs have pubs without pubmed ids.

pubMedId.description: the pubmed id when available, of the reference.
